ReCaptcha¶

To import this module:

from python3_captchaai.recaptcha import ReCaptcha
class recaptcha.ReCaptcha(api_key, captcha_type, websiteURL, websiteKey, pageAction=None, proxyType=None, proxyAddress=None, proxyPort=None, sleep_time=5, request_url='https://api.captchaai.io')¶

The class is used to work with CaptchaAI ReCaptcha methods.

Parameters:

  • api_key (str) – CaptchaAI API key

  • captcha_type (Union[CaptchaTypeEnm, str]) – Captcha type name, like ReCaptchaV2Task and etc.

  • websiteURL (str) – Address of a webpage with Google ReCaptcha

  • websiteKey (str) – Recaptcha website key. <div class=”g-recaptcha” data-sitekey=”THAT_ONE”></div>

  • pageAction (Optional[str]) – Widget action value. Website owner defines what user is doing on the page through this parameter. Default value: verify. Example: grecaptcha.execute(‘site_key’, {action:’login_test’}).

  • proxyType (Optional[Union[ProxyType, str]]) – Type of the proxy

  • proxyAddress (Optional[str]) – Proxy IP address IPv4/IPv6. Not allowed to use: host names instead of IPs, transparent proxies (where client IP is visible), proxies from local networks (192.., 10.., 127…)

  • proxyPort (Optional[int]) – Proxy port.

  • sleep_time (Optional[int]) – The waiting time between requests to get the result of the Captcha

  • request_url (Optional[str]) – API address for sending requests

Examples

>>> ReCaptcha(api_key="CAI-1324...",
...           captcha_type="ReCaptchaV2TaskProxyLess",
...           websiteURL="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo",
...           websiteKey="6Le-wvkSAAAAAPBMRTvw0Q4Muexq9bi0DJwx_mJ-"
...          ).captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
Returns:

CaptchaResponseSer model with full server response

Parameters:

  • captcha_type (Union[CaptchaTypeEnm, str]) –

  • pageAction (Optional[str]) –

Notes

https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/393446 https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/426184 https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/393981 https://captchaai.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CAPTCHAAI/pages/426203

captcha_handler(**additional_params)¶

Synchronous method for captcha solving

Parameters:

additional_params – Some additional parameters that will be used in creating the task and will be passed to the payload under task key. Like recaptchaDataSValue, isInvisible, userAgent, cookies, proxyLogin, proxyPassword - more info in service docs

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Examples

>>> ReCaptcha(api_key="CAI-1324...",
...           captcha_type="ReCaptchaV2TaskProxyLess",
...           websiteURL="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo",
...           websiteKey="6Le-wvkSAAAAAPBMRTvw0Q4Muexq9bi0DJwx_mJ-"
...          ).captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
Returns:

CaptchaResponseSer model with full service response

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Notes

Check class docstirng for more info

async aio_captcha_handler(**additional_params)¶

Asynchronous method for captcha solving

Parameters:

additional_params – Some additional parameters that will be used in creating the task and will be passed to the payload under task key. Like recaptchaDataSValue, isInvisible, userAgent, cookies, proxyLogin, proxyPassword - more info in service docs

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer

Examples

>>> await ReCaptcha(api_key="CAI-1324...",
...                 captcha_type="ReCaptchaV2TaskProxyLess",
...                 websiteURL="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo",
...                 websiteKey="6Le-wvkSAAAAAPBMRTvw0Q4Muexq9bi0DJwx_mJ-"
...                ).aio_captcha_handler()
CaptchaResponseSer(errorId=False
                   errorCode=None
                   errorDescription=None
                   taskId=None
                   status=<ResponseStatusEnm.Ready: 'ready'>
                   solution={'gRecaptchaResponse': '44795sds'}
                  )
Returns:

CaptchaResponseSer model with full service response

Return type:

CaptchaResponseSer
